title: 5 people shot outside of club on Detroit's west side
content:
Autoplay:5 people shot outside of club on Detroit's west sideCONNECTING...
DETROIT (WXYZ) - Detroit police are investigating after five people were shot outside of a club late Sunday night.
It happened at the Penthouse Lounge on the city's west side around 11 p.m.
Police say five people were shot as they left the lounge. We're told the suspected shooter got into an argument inside and was kicked out. He then waited outside in the parking lot and opened fire on the victims, according to police.
The victims suffered non-life threatening injuries and are listed in stable condition at a local hospital.
Police are now searching for the shooter.
STAY WITH WXYZ.COM FOR UPDATES.
